page.title: 03LIFE STYLES - DAILY LIFE
page.content:
A DAY ON THE LIFE OF RICHARD LIDDAMORE-AGED TWELVE
I WOKE UP AT SEVEN OCLOCK AND WENT AND MADE MY MUM AND DAD A CUP OF TEA,AND THEN PLAYED ON MY COMPUTER.I PLAYED JETPACK.THEN I GOT DRESSED,AND AS I DID NOT HAVE TO GO TO SCHOOL TODAY,I HAD A COOKED BREAKFAST.I THEN HELPED MUM BY WASHING THE DISHES,AND BY TEN OCLOCK I WAS READY TO TAKE MY BABY SISTER FOR A WALK TO THE SWINGS.WHEN WE GOT HOME I WENT AND PLAYED FOOTBALL WITH MY ELDER BROTHER.HE WAS NOT VERY GOOD,SO I SCORED A LOT OF GOALS.AFTER LUNCH I WATCHED TELEVISION UNTIL HALF PAST FOUR,THEN I PLAYED ON MY COMPUTER AGAIN.AFTER TEA I WATCHED TELEVISION UNTIL IT WAS TIME FOR BED AT TEN OCLOCK-LATER THAN USUAL BECAUSE THERE WAS NO SCHOOL THE NEXT DAY.
